name: OTHERNESS (Dark Energy Games)
description:
In an ultraviolent cyberpunk society, the Government has a program to find solutions on how to reduce the rate of violence. With growing difficulties in creating consensus - more violence becomes the preferred option. June is a researcher. In that program, her job is find ways for keeping people frightened and to avoid revolts.

Her mother, Patricia, who abandoned her as a child to build a better world. She was part of a group that uses non-violent communication to peacefully resolve conflicts. After a traumatic experience, June one day decides to follow the same path she followed one day.

Know Issues
1) Shaders Issues;
2) Lighthing sometimes can disappear;
3) Cliping on building can occur;
4) A 'Tesseract' may appear during the game, no need to be afraid;
5) Sometimes the "Game Over" in the boss scene doesn't appear;

Still in Development

2) New lightning setup;
3) New camera setup (WIP);

6) 2 New Mechanics: Dialogue and Key Enemy;
7) Narrative Development;
8) The Giraffe HQ, will be implemented this week. In this new scene you will be able to learn about the non-violent communication. This scene, is between the Virtual Reality Machine and the boss scene.
